name: Abandoned cart SMS reminders and SMS campaigns – CartFox
author: CartFox

sections.installation:
1. Install the plugin
  2. Create user account on: https://cartfox.io
  3. Connect your store with API Key generated in CartFox Administration
sections.faq:
Is there a subscription?

You don’t have to pick a monthly / yearly subscription to start using CartFox. Simply load your credits and you’re ready to go! And don’t forget – after you successfully integrate and authenticate your store, we give you credit to send your first 300 SMSes!

Where do I sign up?

You can sign up to use CartFox here: https://app.cartfox.io/

What countries can CartFox send SMSes to?

You can currently send text messages to 58 countries (click here to check the full list), but we expand our list on a monthly basis!

UI language support

CartFox is currently available in English, Italian, Romanian and Slovenian. More coming very soon!

sections.description:
Dynamic SMS abandoned cart reminders with coupons, post-purchase campaigns and various options for SMS campaigns. Available for 58 languages worldwide. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ETAoIuPNYkk

Turn abandoned carts into profit!

CartFox offers text-messaging to remind your clients of their abandoned carts or to attract your clients after they’ve already made a purchase.

2500% average roas

With the power of integrated coupons and free shipping, a huge number of clients will return to your store and finish ordering.

99% open rate

Text messages have the highest number of open rates from all the channels. With a 99% open rate, you can rest assured that your message will be seen.

Easy to use and install

You don’t need a programmer to start using CartFox. Simply install our plugin, enter your key and you’re ready to go!

Covering 59 countries – and expanding daily

We send text messages all over the world. To make text messages more impactful, we offer integrated translations for most of the countries.

The first 300 SMSes are on us!

After you successfully integrate and authenticate your store, we give you credit to send your first 300 SMSes!

Other features:

  • Lowest text message prices
  • Intuitive dashboard
  • Connect multiple websites
  • Predefined text messages
  • Integrated link shortener
  • Full customization options
